value.title: Looking for a Headless CMS? - deco.cx Headless Frontend Platform
value.description: deco.cx is an all-in-one frontend platform and your simplified path to adopting headless architecture with speed and affordability, integrated with any commerce backend.

lines: paving your way to a smooth headless adoption.

cards.text: Break free from your current platform limitations. Craft unique shopping journeys with limitless customization.
cards.title:
Freedom to Build 
Any Experience.

cards.text: No-code visual editor combined with a full-code modern tech stack based on Deno, Typescript and Tailwind.
cards.title:

With and Without Code.

cards.text: Get more visibility boosting Core Web Vitals, Pagespeed and SEO ranking with headless architecture.

and SEO

cards.text: Seamlessly transition to headless in under two months – no complications, no stress.
cards.title:
< 60-Day Migration﻿,
Zero Hassles

cards.text: Empower teams with an editor that blends business autonomy with tech efficiency for rapid, collaborative development.
cards.title:
Realtime Collaboration
for Biz and Tech teams

cards.text: Know everything that's going on with your store and code. Find and fix issues instantly with out-of-the-box tools.

value.title: Start Fast With a Pre-Built UI Component Library
value.description: Kick off projects swiftly using our complete, extensible and universal library of ready-to-use UI components. Theme anything with in-browser code editor or use our native Design System tooling.

value.title: Visual Site Editor to Create Experiences for Each Audience
value.description: Go beyond A/B testing. Craft unique digital experiences tailored to each of your audiences, leveraging our intuitive editor and AI co-pílot.

value.title: Integrates With Any Commerce Backend
value.description: Enhance your site seamlessly connecting with any e-commerce platform or other APIs for a unified backend experience.

value.title: 100% Managed Infrastructure on Global Edge
value.description: Choose between self-hosting or using managed global edge infrastructure that deploys your code in 35 regions around the globe, ensuring the lowest server latency possible and auto-scaling as your grow.

value.title: Headless CMS for Commerce
value.description: deco.cx is an all-in-one frontend platform and your simplified path to adopting headless architecture with speed and affordability, integrated with any commerce backend.
